OrgName: Stryker Corporation and its US affiliates and subsidiaries
activities: Stryker Corporation collects, uses, and otherwise processes Employee Data for the following purposes: personnel administration and management (including workforce and workflow planning, career development and training), job suitability assessments, compensation and benefits related activities (including determining eligibility for retirement and benefits programs and maintaining and administering such programs), succession planning and career development, payroll administration, performance management, emergency contact purposes, providing IT support and services and centralizing company systems and applications, global directory administration, making work-related travel arrangements, underwriting of insurance and processing of claims, protecting the security of  Employee Data as well as Company systems and premises, monitoring and ensuring compliance with applicable laws and policies and procedures and investigating possible breaches of such laws, policies and procedures.
contacttitle1: Senior Director, HR Practices and Systems
eucountries: Austria, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
